sentences.english: Some cases are ridiculously wrong, and some cases totally reversed the right and the wrong.
sentences.chinese: 有些案子错得离奇，有些案子则完全颠倒黑白。

sentences.english: The world once distorting flowery colour, now return.
sentences.chinese: 世界曾经颠倒黑白，如今回归绚丽色彩。

sentences.english: He is the kind of person who calls white black .
sentences.chinese: 他就是那种颠倒黑白的人。

sentences.english: It's a pity that she (should) call black white.
sentences.chinese: 真遗憾，她竟然颠倒黑白。

sentences.english: But just a couple of years earlier people thought that Wall Street could do nothing right.
sentences.chinese: 但是过了几年，人们却转而认为华尔街总是颠倒黑白。

the guilty party files the suit/the thief cries thief
